JIBAL data installation instructions.

1. Run JIBAL bootstrap on Windows from start menu.
On macOS and Linux run "jibal_bootstrap".

2. Copy these files to the "userdatadir" displayed.

This directory on Windows should be %AppData%/Jibal
Typical location, assuming your username is UserName:
C:\Users\UserName\AppData\Roaming\jibal

On macOS and Linux the directory is (hidden) $HOME/.jibal/,

i.e. /Users/username/.jibal/ on macOS
or /home/username/.jibal/ on Linux

3. You can overwrite existing files.txt and assignments.txt or modify them to suit your needs.
